name: Scarpa ZG Lite Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
description: A nimble and light boot for exploring your local mountains, embarking on a trek, or fastpacking on the weekend. The ZG Lite strikes a balance between lightweight construction and a supportive feel. The heel overlay holds your foot in place and provides lateral stability, while flex points at the ankle allow your foot to bend naturally without restriction. The midsole absorbs shock with moderate loads, and the Salix Trek sole keeps you from skidding or slipping on scree or loose gravel.Suede and nylon upper is abrasion- and water-resistant.GORE-TEX® Performance Comfort membrane is waterproof and breathable.Multiple lace zones and lace locks for a customized fit.TPU toe cap protects your feet and your footwear.Dual-density polyurethane midsole use ACTIV Impact technology for cushy rebound.Vibram® Salix outsole has Trek rubber for traction in any terrain.
